page.title: 10Plantation Road
page.content: It is Sunday afternoon and I am looking out of my sitting room window my mum opens the window so I can hear all the sounds. The wind is rustling the leaves on the trees and the bushes and the grass is swaying from side to side. I can see a bee taking pollen from a flower. I can hear the drone of traffic on the main road. All the bungalows along the road are painted different colours. I can see cars parked on driveways behind brightly coloured gates. The sky is blue with white clouds drifting about. It looks like rain as same of the clouds are darker than others. There are red,pink and white roses in my garden. My mum weeds the borders while dad cuts the grass.There is a lamp post outside our gate. The light shines into my mum's bedroom at night.
